com.github.zk1931.jzab

Interface Election

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FastLeaderElection

    public interface Election
    Interface for the leader election implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String electLeader()
      Starts one round leader election.
      void reply(MessageTuple tuple)
      Replies its vote to peer.
      void specifyLeader(String leader)
      Specifies the leader explicitly.

    • Method Detail

      • electLeader

        String electLeader()
                   throws Exception
        Starts one round leader election.
        Returns:
        the elected leader.
        Throws:
        Exception - in case of exception.

      • reply

        void reply(MessageTuple tuple)
        Replies its vote to peer. The leader/follower might receive election message in non-electing phase, it ask Election object to reply its vote.
        Parameters:
        tuple - the message from the querier.

      • specifyLeader

        void specifyLeader(String leader)
        Specifies the leader explicitly. If the server starts by joining the cluster, it doesn't need to go through the leader election. However, the other servers who go back to recovery phase might ask it about the leader information. They can initialize them the knowledge about leader explicitly once they join a cluster.
